name: Scenery Disk 7
overview: Scenery Disk 7 is a scenery add-on for subLOGIC's Flight Simulator II, Flight Assignment: Airline Transport Pilot, UFO, Jet, Thunderchopper, Stealth Mission, it can also be used with Microsoft Flight Simulator 2.x. It covers the areas of Washington, Charlotte, Jacksonville and Miami, adding airports, landmarks, visual detail and navigational aids.
